text:
@SecPompeo Do the unhinged tweets from your boss encouraging death by contagion count? Asking for a bunch of friends. 
(60% of tested confirmed COVID-19 cases on the USS Theodore Roosevelt were asymptomatic but infectious and “felt fine”)
